mapper.select: SELECT * FROM kv_travel_time WHERE VEHICLE_ID=#{ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{reportTimeOfDate,jdbcType=DATE}>=DRIVE_START_DATE AND #{reportTimeOfDate,jdbcType=DATE}<=DRIVE_END_DATE AND #{reportTimeOfTime,jdbcType=TIME}>=DRIVE_START_TIME AND #{reportTimeOfTime,jdbcType=TIME}<=DRIVE_END_TIME and state=1;
